title: Idhu Enga Balle Lakka Lyrics Mankatha Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik, Vijay Yesudas, Anusha Dhayanidhi
Song: Idhu Enga Balle Lakka
Lyrics : Gangai Amaren
Music Director : Yuvan Shankar Raja

Idhu enga Balle Lakka, nee kelu kokka makka
New type-u naakku mukka, aadiko kicka
Abhi sabbo acha acha, aandavan kan vachaan vachaan
Adi da dhool machan machan, vaangiko extra

Soodhila soodhu, adhu suthamaaga yethappa
Ulagellam poondhu adha oruti podappa

Thappu kooda thappaagadhu satham pottu sollappa
Naanga sonna vaartha kelu, kaiya korthu allappa

Hey.. thaana kidaikuma? santhosam thaan
Neeya eduthuko unakaagathaan
Veena polambuna vidiyaathappa
Vilakka yethuna iruttathappa
Mudiyaathadhu, padiyaathathu
Yethum kidayaadhatha idhuthaan kanakku
Vidiyaathathu, onnum puriyaathathu -ada
athuthaanada irutto iruttu

Thittam potu thatti paaru
Kitta serum thannaala
Vattam pottu, katti podu varum
Laapam unnaala

Veena thoonguthu pala kodithaan -atha
mulika vaipavan killaadi thaan
Olachi vazhave venaamada - pirar
ulaipil vahvadhe varam thaanada
Aasapadu, alave illa
Aambalaiku athuthaan azhagu
Kovapadu, kuraiye illa
Pombalaiku athu thaan poruppu

Thittam potu thatti paaru
Kitta serum thannaala
Vattam pottu, katti podu varum
Laapam unnaala

Idhu enga Balle Lakka, nee kelu kokka makka
New type-u naakku mukka, aadiko kicka
Abhi sabbo acha acha, aandavan kan vachaan vachaan
Adi da dhool machan machan, vaangiko extra

Soodhila soodhu, adhu suthamaaga yethappa
Ulagellam poondhu adha oruti podappa

Thappu kooda thappaagadhu satham pottu sollappa
Naanga sonna vaartha kelu, kaiya korthu allappa
